author: Tyler Sullivan
title: Fantasy Focus
text:
Who to play, who to bench in your lineup this week:
Studs
Patriots RB LeGarrette Blount at Colts — Dion Lewis is the guy, but who is to say this doesn’t turn into Jacksonville and Blount gets three scores in a blowout?
Ravens RB Buck Allen at 49ers — Justin Forsett is not 100 percent and the fourth rounder looked good last weekend.
Giants WR Dwayne Harris at Eagles — If Beckham Jr. and/or Randle are out, Harris will get a lot of looks on Monday night.
Bengals TE Tyler Eifert at Bills — Tough defense, but he is a must start. Capable of what he did last week (8-90-2) each time out.
Vikings QB Teddy Bridgewater vs. Chiefs — Facing one of the worst defensive backfields in the league and could be a nice bye week filler.
Chiefs RB Knile Davis at Vikings — It’s Davis not Charcandrick West atop the KC depth chart. The Vikings run defense allowed 146 yards and a score on the ground before the bye. Duds
Jaguars QB Blake Bortles vs. Texans — Four touchdowns last week might be an aberration and he’s not entirely healthy.
Bengals RB Jeremy Hill at Bills — Has been up and down all year. This week he’s down.
Redskins WR Pierre Garcon at Jets — Kirk Cousins and Garcon will have a rough day with Darrelle Revis and the Jets defense.
Browns TE Gary Barnidge vs. Broncos — I stay away from teams playing Denver if I can.
Giants TE Larry Donnell at Eagles — Last week’s touchdown was cool, but I don’t think he builds off it.
